mapper.sql: project_application_id, project_category_id, project_name, project_description, project_index, project_index_state, project_money, user_id, review_principal_id, review_leader_id, project_application_upload_address, is_meeting, meeting_review_message, review_phase, failure_reason, application_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from tbl_ProjectApplication
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from tbl_ProjectApplication where user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ((review_phase = 7) or (review_phase between 1 and 5) or (review_phase = 8))
select * from tbl_ProjectApplication as a where a.review_phase=6 or a.project_index_state=false

select a.* from tbl_ProjectApplication as a left join tbl_ProjectCategory as b on a.project_category_id = b.project_category_id where (a.review_phase = 5 or a.review_phase = 6) and (b.principal_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or b.review_leader_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_ProjectApplication (project_application_id, project_category_id, project_name, project_description, project_index, project_index_state, project_money, user_id, review_principal_id, review_leader_id, project_application_upload_address, is_meeting, meeting_review_message, review_phase, failure_reason, application_time) values (#{projectApplicationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectIndexState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewPrincipalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewLeaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectApplicationUploadAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isMeeting,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{meetingReviewMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewPhase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{failureReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
